update order_info
username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
tel = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
unit = #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
position = #{position,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

move_into_time = #{moveIntoTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update order_info set username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tel = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, unit = #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, position = #{position,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, accommodation = #{accommodation,jdbcType=INTEGER}, move_into_time = #{moveIntoTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, room_type = #{roomType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, orderTime = #{ordertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, isValid = #{isvalid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, move_out_time = #{moveOutTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, dock = #{dock,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select
from order_info where tel = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and isValid ="1"

select
from order_info where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and isValid ="1"

SELECT a.notsignIn notsignIn, b.signIn signIn FROM ( SELECT count( * ) notsignIN FROM order_info WHERE isValid = 1 AND isCheck = 0 ) a INNER JOIN ( SELECT count( * ) signIn FROM order_info WHERE isValid = 1 AND isCheck = 1 ) b;
